description: Try our easy to follow Chorizo And Tomato Rigatoni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,Sausage,High protein,Tomato,Low sugar,Spinach,Mushroom
name: Chorizo And Tomato Rigatoni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Maggi devilled sausages recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rigatoni according to packet instructions, keep warm.
Meanwhile, in a large frying pan, heat oil, add onion; cook for 34 minutes or until onions are softened. Add chorizo and cook for a further 2 minutes, or until browned lightly.

Add mushrooms cook for 34 minutes or until tender; add combined tomatoes, water (1 cup â€“ 250ml) and Maggi devilled sausages recipe base; bring to a boil, toss through pasta and baby spinach leaves. Serve.
